page.title: 14ABERDEEN NEWSPAPER STORIES.
page.content: {OIL TOOLS FIRM EXPANDS.}Many oil companies have moved to Farburn Ind. Estate in Dyce e.g.Baker Oil Tools have moved from Bridge of Don to Dyce this week.The 550 jobs are going to increase. {NORTHERN LIGHTS WINS AGAIN.}The Pop Group from Bankhead Academy are in the limelight again.They were guests of honour at a reception given by G.R.C. The group won the National Schools Rock and Pop Competition. {DYCE MOTOR CYCLIST KILLED.}A 19 year old was killed when his motorbike hit a tree.He was thought to be travelling from Aberdeen Airport.He died in the Aberdeen Royal Infirmary. {500,000 REASONS TO CELEBRATE.}Retired couple Denis and Isobel Buckland were presented with a microwave.In 1948 Denis switched on a power supply to over 500,000 people.
